name: X-Poker - Online Home Game
description:
You can play poker with friends anytime and anywhere on X-Poker. X-Poker use cutting edge technology to ensure players from all over the world can compete on a fair and secure platform.From Texas Holdem, Pot Limit Omaha (4&5&6 cards) to Open Face Chinese Poker, players can find all kinds of popular poker games on X-Poker. Download X-Poker now and start to enjoy the ultimate fun with your poker buddies!

You can create your own private club, start a poker table with the rules you prefer and invite your friends to play, you can chat and send funny emoji to your friends while playing on X-Poker. X-Poker strive to make playing poker on your cellphone as fun as playing on a live home game.

If you miss the fun of poker like good old times, open X-Poker and you can start to battle with friends on poker tables immediately!

[Free to use] Free to create your own private clubs!
[Multi table action] Easy to play 3 tables at the same time!
[Full control of the game] Your club, your games, your call, you are in full control!
[Jackpot] Enable the jackpot feature now, add more excitement to the game!
[Excellent social experience] Text, voice and funny emoji, there are so much fun to interact with friends during the game!
